snippet: Stocks rallied on Wednesday as investors reacted to the Federal Reserve’s decision to begin the long-awaited reduction of its economic stimulus.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rallied on Wednesday as investors reacted to the Federal Reserve’s decision to begin the long-awaited reduction of its economic stimulus.

headline.main: It’s a Taper, but Markets Find Reason to Rise
headline.print_headline: It’s a Taper, but Markets Find Reason to Rise
